subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|ic}}.

In oracle bone script form, this character depicts a ghost ({{l|zh|鬼}}) holding a stick. (Hsiao-ting Li)

The small seal glyph was analysed by ''{{w|Shuo Wen}}'' as a ghost head ({{l|zh|甶}}) with part of a tiger, including its claw.
